verses.verse: בִּשְׁנַ֛ת <WH8141> year שְׁמוֹנֶ֥ה <WH8083> eight עֶשְׂרֵ֖ה <WH6240> teen לַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> of king יָרָבְעָ֑ם <WH3379> Jeroboam וַיִּמְלֹ֥ךְ <WH4427> to reign אֲבִיָּ֖ה <WH29> began Abijah עַל־ <WH5921> over יְהוּדָֽה׃ <WH3063> over Judah

שָׁל֣וֹשׁ <WH7969> three שָׁנִ֗ים <WH8141> years מָלַךְ֙ <WH4427> He reigned בִּיר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <WH3389> in Jerusalem וְשֵׁ֣ם <WH8034> name אִמּ֔וֹ <WH517> His mother's מִיכָיָ֥הוּ <WH4322> also [was] Michaiah בַת־ <WH1323> the daughter אוּרִיאֵ֖ל <WH222> of Uriel מִן־ <WH4480> at גִּבְעָ֑ה <WH1390> of Gibeah וּמִלְחָמָ֥ה <WH4421> And there was war הָיְתָ֛ה <WH1961> become בֵּ֥ין <WH996> between אֲבִיָּ֖ה <WH29> between Abijah וּבֵ֥ין <WH996> between יָרָבְעָֽם׃ <WH3379> and Jeroboam

וַיֶּאְסֹ֨ר <WH631> in array אֲבִיָּ֜ה <WH29> And Abijah אֶת־ <WH853> הַמִּלְחָמָ֗ה <WH4421> the battle בְּחַ֙יִל֙ <WH2428> with an army גִּבּוֹרֵ֣י <WH1368> of valiant men מִלְחָמָ֔ה <WH4421> of war אַרְבַּע־ <WH702> [even] four מֵא֥וֹת <WH3967> hundred אֶ֖לֶף <WH505> thousand אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> men בָּח֑וּר <WH970> young ס וְיָרָבְעָ֗ם <WH3379> Jeroboam עָרַ֤ךְ <WH6186> in array עִמּוֹ֙ <WH5973> set מִלְחָמָ֔ה <WH4421> also set the battle בִּשְׁמוֹנֶ֨ה <WH8083> against him with eight מֵא֥וֹת <WH3967> hundred אֶ֛לֶף <WH505> thousand אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> men בָּח֖וּר <WH970> young גִּבּ֥וֹר <WH1368> [being] mighty men חָֽיִל׃ <WH2428> of valour ס

וַיָּ֣קָם <WH6965> stood up אֲבִיָּ֗ה <WH29> And Abijah מֵעַל֙ <WH5921> on לְהַ֣ר <WH2022> upon mount צְמָרַ֔יִם <WH6787> Zemaraim אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> which בְּהַ֣ר <WH2022> which [is] in mount אֶפְרָ֑יִם <WH669> Ephraim וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> and said שְׁמָע֖וּנִי <WH8085> Hear יָרָבְעָ֥ם <WH3379> me thou Jeroboam וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> and all Israel

הֲלֹ֤א <WH3808> not לָכֶם֙ לָדַ֔עַת <WH3045> Ought ye not to know כִּ֞י <WH3588> that יְהוָ֣ה ׀ <WH3068> that the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> God יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> of Israel נָתַ֨ן <WH5414> gave מַמְלָכָ֧ה <WH4467> the kingdom לְדָוִ֛יד <WH1732> to David עַל־ <WH5921> over יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> over Israel לְעוֹלָ֑ם <WH5769> for ever ל֥וֹ וּלְבָנָ֖יו <WH1121> [even] to him and to his sons בְּרִ֥ית <WH1285> by a covenant מֶֽלַח׃ <WH4417> salt ס

וַיָּ֙קָם֙ <WH6965> is risen up יָרָבְעָ֣ם <WH3379> Yet Jeroboam בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son נְבָ֔ט <WH5028> of Nebat עֶ֖בֶד <WH5650> the servant שְׁלֹמֹ֣ה <WH8010> of Solomon בֶן־ <WH1121> the son דָּוִ֑יד <WH1732> of David וַיִּמְרֹ֖ד <WH4775> and hath rebelled עַל־ <WH5921> against אֲדֹנָֽיו׃ <WH113> against his lord

וַיִּקָּבְצ֣וּ <WH6908> And there are gathered עָלָ֗יו <WH5921> about אֲנָשִׁ֤ים <WH582> men רֵקִים֙ <WH7386> unto him vain בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> the children בְלִיַּ֔עַל <WH1100> of Belial וַיִּֽתְאַמְּצ֖וּ <WH553> and have strengthened עַל־ <WH5921> too רְחַבְעָ֣ם <WH7346> themselves against Rehoboam בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son שְׁלֹמֹ֑ה <WH8010> of Solomon וּרְחַבְעָ֗ם <WH7346> when Rehoboam הָ֤יָה <WH1961> become נַ֙עַר֙ <WH5288> was young וְרַךְ־ <WH7390> faint לֵבָ֔ב <WH3824> heart וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> not הִתְחַזַּ֖ק <WH2388> and could not withstand לִפְנֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH6440> them

וְעַתָּ֣ה ׀ <WH6258> now אַתֶּ֣ם <WH859> you אֹֽמְרִ֗ים <WH559> And now ye think לְהִתְחַזֵּק֙ <WH2388> to withstand לִפְנֵי֙ <WH6440> accept מַמְלֶ֣כֶת <WH4467> the kingdom יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD בְּיַ֖ד <WH3027> in the hand בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> of the sons דָוִ֑יד <WH1732> of David וְאַתֶּם֙ <WH859> you הָמ֣וֹן <WH1995> multitude רָ֔ב <WH7227> and ye [be] a great וְעִמָּכֶם֙ <WH5973> with עֶגְלֵ֣י <WH5695> calves זָהָ֔ב <WH2091> and [there are] with you golden אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which עָשָׂ֥ה <WH6213> made לָכֶ֛ם יָרָבְעָ֖ם <WH3379> which Jeroboam לֵאלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> you for gods

הֲלֹ֤א <WH3808> of [them that are] no הִדַּחְתֶּם֙ <WH5080> Have ye not cast out אֶת־ <WH853> כֹּהֲנֵ֣י <WH3548> the priests יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> the sons אַהֲרֹ֖ן <WH175> of Aaron וְהַלְוִיִּ֑ם <WH3881> and the Levites וַתַּעֲשׂ֨וּ <WH6213> and have made לָכֶ֤ם כֹּהֲנִים֙ <WH3548> you priests כְּעַמֵּ֣י <WH5971> after the manner of the nations הָאֲרָצ֔וֹת <WH776> common כָּל־ <WH3605> all manner הַבָּ֗א <WH935> comes לְמַלֵּ֨א <WH4390> accomplish יָד֜וֹ <WH3027> himself בְּפַ֤ר <WH6499> bullock בֶּן־ <WH1121> A young בָּקָר֙ <WH1241> bull וְאֵילִ֣ם <WH352> rams שִׁבְעָ֔ה <WH7651> and seven וְהָיָ֥ה <WH1961> may become כֹהֵ֖ן <WH3548> [the same] may be a priest לְלֹ֥א <WH3808> no אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> gods ס

וַאֲנַ֛חְנוּ <WH587> we יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> But as for us the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֖ינוּ <WH430> [is] our God וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> have not עֲזַבְנֻ֑הוּ <WH5800> and we have not forsaken וְכֹ֨הֲנִ֜ים <WH3548> him and the priests מְשָׁרְתִ֤ים <WH8334> which minister לַֽיהוָה֙ <WH3068> unto the LORD בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> [are] the sons אַהֲרֹ֔ן <WH175> of Aaron וְהַלְוִיִּ֖ם <WH3881> and the Levites בַּמְלָֽאכֶת׃ <WH4399> [wait] upon [their] business

וּמַקְטִרִ֣ים <WH6999> And they burn לַיהוָ֡ה <WH3068> unto the LORD עֹל֣וֹת <WH5930> burnt sacrifices בַּבֹּֽקֶר־ <WH1242> every morning בַּבֹּ֣קֶר <WH1242> morning וּבָעֶֽרֶב־ <WH6153> and every evening בָּעֶ֣רֶב <WH6153> every evening וּקְטֹֽרֶת־ <WH7004> incense סַמִּים֩ <WH5561> and sweet וּמַעֲרֶ֨כֶת <WH4635> row לֶ֜חֶם <WH3899> bread עַל־ <WH5921> and הַשֻּׁלְחָ֣ן <WH7979> table הַטָּה֗וֹר <WH2889> also [set they in order] upon the pure וּמְנוֹרַ֨ת <WH4501> and the candlestick הַזָּהָ֤ב <WH2091> of gold וְנֵרֹתֶ֙יהָ֙ <WH5216> with the lamps לְבָעֵר֙ <WH1197> thereof to burn בָּעֶ֣רֶב <WH6153> evening בָּעֶ֔רֶב <WH6153> every כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for שֹׁמְרִ֣ים <WH8104> for we keep אֲנַ֔חְנוּ <WH587> ourselves אֶת־ <WH853> מִשְׁמֶ֖רֶת <WH4931> the charge יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֑ינוּ <WH430> our God וְאַתֶּ֖ם <WH859> you עֲזַבְתֶּ֥ם <WH5800> but ye have forsaken אֹתֽוֹ׃ <WH853>

וְהִנֵּה֩ <WH2009> now behold עִמָּ֨נוּ <WH5973> against בָרֹ֜אשׁ <WH7218> himself [is] with us for [our] captain הָאֱלֹהִ֧ים ׀ <WH430> And behold God וְכֹהֲנָ֛יו <WH3548> and his priests וַחֲצֹצְר֥וֹת <WH2689> trumpets הַתְּרוּעָ֖ה <WH8643> with sounding לְהָרִ֣יעַ <WH7321> to cry alarm עֲלֵיכֶ֑ם <WH5921> against בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> against you O children יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> of Israel אַל־ <WH408> not תִּלָּֽחֲמ֛וּ <WH3898> fight עִם־ <WH5973> against יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> ye not against the LORD אֱלֹהֵֽי־ <WH430> God אֲבֹתֵיכֶ֖ם <WH1> of your fathers כִּי־ <WH3588> for לֹ֥א <WH3808> you will not תַצְלִֽיחוּ׃ <WH6743> for ye shall not prosper

וְיָֽרָבְעָ֗ם <WH3379> But Jeroboam הֵסֵב֙ <WH5437> about אֶת־ <WH853> הַמַּאְרָ֔ב <WH3993> caused an ambushment לָב֖וֹא <WH935> to come מֵֽאַחֲרֵיהֶ֑ם <WH310> behind וַיִּֽהְיוּ֙ <WH1961> was in לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> them so they were before יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> Judah וְהַמַּאְרָ֖ב <WH3993> and the ambushment מֵאַחֲרֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH310> [was] behind

וַיִּפְנ֣וּ <WH6437> looked back יְהוּדָ֗ה <WH3063> And when Judah וְהִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> behold לָהֶ֤ם הַמִּלְחָמָה֙ <WH4421> behold the battle פָּנִ֣ים <WH6440> [was] before וְאָח֔וֹר <WH268> and behind וַֽיִּצְעֲק֖וּ <WH6817> and they cried לַיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> unto the LORD וְהַכֹּ֣הֲנִ֔ים <WH3548> and the priests [מַחֲצֹצְרִים כ] (מַחְצְרִ֖ים <WH2690> blow ק) בַּחֲצֹצְרֽוֹת׃ <WH2689> with the trumpets

וַיָּרִ֖יעוּ <WH7321> gave a shout אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> Then the men יְהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> of Judah וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> A war בְּהָרִ֙יעַ֙ <WH7321> shouted אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> and as the men יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> of Judah וְהָאֱלֹהִ֗ים <WH430> it came to pass that God נָגַ֤ף <WH5062> smote אֶת־ <WH853> יָֽרָבְעָם֙ <WH3379> Jeroboam וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> and all Israel לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> before אֲבִיָּ֖ה <WH29> Abijah וִיהוּדָֽה׃ <WH3063> and Judah

וַיָּנ֥וּסוּ <WH5127> fled בְנֵי־ <WH1121> And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel מִפְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> before יְהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> Judah וַיִּתְּנֵ֥ם <WH5414> delivered אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> and God בְּיָדָֽם׃ <WH3027> them into their hand

וַיַּכּ֥וּ <WH5221> slew בָהֶ֛ם אֲבִיָּ֥ה <WH29> And Abijah וְעַמּ֖וֹ <WH5971> and his people מַכָּ֣ה <WH4347> slaughter רַבָּ֑ה <WH7227> them with a great וַיִּפְּל֤וּ <WH5307> so there fell down חֲלָלִים֙ <WH2491> slain מִיִּשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel חֲמֵשׁ־ <WH2568> five מֵא֥וֹת <WH3967> hundred אֶ֖לֶף <WH505> thousand אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> men בָּחֽוּר׃ <WH970> young

וַיִּכָּנְע֥וּ <WH3665> were brought בְנֵי־ <WH1121> Thus the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel בָּעֵ֣ת <WH6256> under at that time הַהִ֑יא <WH1931> he וַיֶּֽאֶמְצוּ֙ <WH553> prevailed בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> and the children יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> of Judah כִּ֣י <WH3588> because נִשְׁעֲנ֔וּ <WH8172> because they relied עַל־ <WH5921> in יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> upon the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֥י <WH430> God אֲבוֹתֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH1> of their fathers

וַיִּרְדֹּ֣ף <WH7291> pursued אֲבִיָּה֮ <WH29> And Abijah אַחֲרֵ֣י <WH310> after יָרָבְעָם֒ <WH3379> Jeroboam וַיִּלְכֹּ֤ד <WH3920> and took מִמֶּ֙נּוּ֙ <WH4480> from עָרִ֔ים <WH5892> cities אֶת־ <WH853> בֵּֽית־ אֵל֙ <WH1008> from him Bethel וְאֶת־ <WH853> בְּנוֹתֶ֔יהָ <WH1323> with the towns וְאֶת־ <WH853> יְשָׁנָ֖ה <WH3466> thereof and Jeshanah וְאֶת־ <WH853> בְּנוֹתֶ֑יהָ <WH1323> with the towns וְאֶת־ <WH853> [עֶפְרֹון כ] (עֶפְרַ֖יִן <WH6085> Ephron ק) וּבְנֹתֶֽיהָ׃ <WH1323> with the towns

וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> not עָצַ֧ר <WH6113> recover כֹּֽחַ־ <WH3581> strength יָרָבְעָ֛ם <WH3379> Neither did Jeroboam ע֖וֹד <WH5750> again בִּימֵ֣י <WH3117> again in the days אֲבִיָּ֑הוּ <WH29> of Abijah וַיִּגְּפֵ֥הוּ <WH5062> struck יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> and the LORD וַיָּמֹֽת׃ <WH4191> him and he died פ

וַיִּתְחַזֵּ֣ק <WH2388> waxed mighty אֲבִיָּ֔הוּ <WH29> But Abijah וַיִּ֨שָּׂא־ <WH5375> and married ל֔וֹ נָשִׁ֖ים <WH802> wives אַרְבַּ֣ע <WH702> four עֶשְׂרֵ֑ה <WH6240> teen וַיּ֗וֹלֶד <WH3205> and begat עֶשְׂרִ֤ים <WH6242> twenty וּשְׁנַ֙יִם֙ <WH8147> and two בָּנִ֔ים <WH1121> sons וְשֵׁ֥שׁ <WH8337> six עֶשְׂרֵ֖ה <WH6240> teen בָּנֽוֹת׃ <WH1323> daughters ס

וְיֶ֙תֶר֙ <WH3499> And the rest דִּבְרֵ֣י <WH1697> of the acts אֲבִיָּ֔ה <WH29> of Abijah וּדְרָכָ֖יו <WH1870> and his ways וּדְבָרָ֑יו <WH1697> and his sayings כְּתוּבִ֕ים <WH3789> [are] written בְּמִדְרַ֖שׁ <WH4097> in the story הַנָּבִ֥יא <WH5030> of the prophet עִדּֽוֹ׃ <WH5714> Iddo
